decision_tree.name: tool_selection
decision_tree.question: What type of operation is needed?

avoid.name: reading_entire_files
avoid.description: Reading entire files when only specific symbols are needed
avoid.instead: Use mcp__serena__get_symbols_overview for file structure and mcp__serena__find_symbol with include_body for specific implementations

avoid.name: unscoped_searches
avoid.description: Searching entire codebase when scope is known
avoid.instead: Use relative_path parameter to restrict search to known files or directories

avoid.name: ignoring_memories
avoid.description: Implementing features without checking existing patterns
avoid.instead: Always check mcp__serena__list_memories and mcp__serena__read_memory before implementation

avoid.name: manual_refactoring
avoid.description: Manually updating symbol references across files
avoid.instead: Use mcp__serena__rename_symbol for consistent renaming with automatic reference updates

avoid.name: excessive_depth
avoid.description: Using high depth values unnecessarily in mcp__serena__get_symbols_overview
avoid.instead: Start with depth=0, then incrementally increase if needed

phase.objective: Prepare for effective Serena tool usage
phase.step: 3. Choose appropriate tool based on decision_tree

phase.name: execute
phase.step: 1. Start with mcp__serena__get_symbols_overview for file structure
2. Use mcp__serena__find_symbol with include_body for details

best_practices.practice: Always check memories with mcp__serena__list_memories and mcp__serena__read_memory before implementing new features
Use symbol operations (mcp__serena__get_symbols_overview, mcp__serena__find_symbol) over reading entire files
Restrict searches by relative_path when scope is known to improve performance
Use substring_matching for uncertain symbol names to broaden search results
Record new patterns and conventions with mcp__serena__write_memory for future reference
Use context_lines parameters in mcp__serena__search_for_pattern to understand surrounding code
Verify symbol changes with mcp__serena__find_referencing_symbols before refactoring

rules.rule: Always check memories before implementing new features
Use symbol operations over reading entire files
Call mcp__serena__think_about_task_adherence before making code changes
Restrict searches by relative_path when scope is known
Use substring_matching for uncertain symbol names
